short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cloud9's layout makes it difficult to see the full name or description of a workspace. This extensions makes it much easier.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cloud9 uses a box layout that restricts how wide titles can be. This makes it difficult to read longer titles. This extension changes the layout so that all of the workspace boxes are now wide and easier to read.
